song_lyrics: Divyabhāv divyabhāv divyabhāvno (jone) sāgar chhalakāyo jāy,
Loḍh ūchhaḷe chhe māhātmyanā (āj) Mahant mukhe laherāy... Dhruv 0
Divyabhāvnu anjan evu, doṣh najarmā nā’ve,
Āṭhī pahor ānandmā zūme, sauno mahimā gāve,
Upāsanā ne divyabhāvmā sādhan-mātra samāy... 1
Divyabhāvmā magna rahe te, Shrījīne man bhāve chhe,
Devo enā darshan karavā, avanī upar āve chhe,
Shrī Harinī Vachanāmṛut vāṇī, gurumukhe samajāy... 2
Dās dāsnā gulām rahīe, nirdoṣh-buddhi karīe,
Saunī pad-raj mastak dharīe, Yogī Pramukhne varīe,
Mahant Swāmīne varīe,
Satsangmā janmyā te saghaḷā akṣhar-mukta kahevāy... 3
Divyabhāvno sāgar chhalake
Mahant Swāmīnā antarmā,
Muktabhāv ne brahmabhāvnī
Divya dṛuṣhṭi chhe bhītaramā;
Jene thayo sambandh pragaṭno,
Nahī manuṣhya e mukta sadā,
Ānjo anjan divya-dṛuṣhṭinā
Akṣhar tamane prārthanā...
title: Divyabhāv divyabhāvno  sāgar chhalakāyo jāy

Category: Mahant Swami Maharajna Pad
